product_name: ALPS Mountaineering SideKick Table - Special Buy
long_description: Small and collapsible, the ALPS Mountaineering SideKick Table is perfect for camping or tailgating. Use it to prep your food, hold your stove or keep s'mores ingredients close at hand. Square top provides enough room for a camp stove with accessories. Made of sturdy anodized aluminum for lightweight handling and durability; X-frame base provides stable support. Special buy.
short_description: Small and collapsible, the ALPS Mountaineering SideKick Table is perfect for camping or tailgating. Use it to prep your food, hold your stove or keep s'mores ingredients close at hand.
